WorkItem.Description: An InvalidOperationExeption is thrown when filtering on "Blanks" items on a row that doesn't contains any empty cell.

Comments.Message: I can`t catch this exception :(Please, describe in detail how you got this errorIt`s was Sample app from v1.0.6 preview?

No, it's in my own test project.I think it's when the datagridview display an empty new line for allowing user to add new data.This empty row is detected as "blank" cells, and therefore the "blank" filter is shown.I will post code, as soon as possible, to reproduce the issue.
The last release has fix this issue.
